title: RAND Experts Available for Interviews at Space Symposium
descriptions: RAND space experts will participate in the Space Symposium in Colorado Springs April 17–20 and are available to comment on a variety of topics.

image.desc: View of the Earth over the Pacific Ocean from space, June 13, 2003, photo courtesy of NASA

sub_content.Interviews:
To arrange an interview, contact the RAND Office of Media Relations:
(703) 414-4795 or
(310) 451-6913, or
send an email to media@rand.org.

content.Article: April 17, 2023 The following RAND space experts will participate in the Space Symposium in Colorado Springs April 17–20 and are available to comment on a variety of topics: To arrange an interview, contact Erin Dick at erind@rand.org or media@rand.org or call +1.310.625.8162 or +1.310.451.6913 The RAND Corporation's Space Enterprise Initiative is a virtual center, providing a focal point for RAND's space-related research for the U.S. government and U.S. allies.
